title: Ticket #1840: Comments should be permissible in condor_mapfile
description:
It is not apparent how to comment-out lines in the Condor mapfile. Judging from our local D_FULLDEBUG logs, a '#' does not start a comment: 

01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=People\/CN\=Anthony\ Tiradani\ 329103$' canonicalization='frontend'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=People\/CN\=Derek\ Weitzel\ 285345$' canonicalization='frontend'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=People\/CN\=Brian\ Bockelman\ 504307$' canonicalization='bbockelm'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=Services\/CN\=host\/hcc\-grid\.unl\.edu$' canonicalization='dweitzel'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=Services\/CN\=host\/cpass\.unl\.edu$' canonicalization='dweitzel'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=People\/CN\=Ajit\ Kumar\ Mohapatra\ 867118$' canonicalization='cmsprod'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='^\/DC\=org\/DC\=doegrids\/OU\=Services\/CN\=host\/(.*)\.unl\.edu$' canonicalization='\1@daemon.unl.edu'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='gsi' principal='(.*)' canonicalization='anonymous'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='claimtobe' principal='.*' canonicalization='anonymous@claimtobe'
01/06/11 19:05:45 MapFile: Canonicalization File: method='#claimtobe' principal='.*@ff-grid.unl.edu' canonicalization='dweitzel'

We should make lines starting with '#' a comment, just as in the Condor configuration file.
creator: bbockelm
